title: Episode 7: We're Nuts About Wine and Cheese
itunes:title: We're Nuts About Wine and Cheese
description:
Trader Joe’s has been selling nuts, wine, and cheese since our even-humbler beginnings. In this episode of “Inside Trader Joe’s,” we explain which nuts our customers are the most nutty about. We recommend some cheeses you may not have tried. And we reveal which wines are, we believe, the best in the store – at any price.

 

Episode 7 Transcript (PDF)
